des: "Orange and cream flavored like the CreamsicleÂ® PopsicleÂ® you had as a kid, but all grown up.  A great dessert drink. Also good blended with ice for a frozen drink."
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Pour in the vodka, triple sec, orange juice, and half-and-half. Shake until frosty, about 15 seconds; strain into a martini glass, and garnish with an orange slice.
